features.weatherDescription: Ka hel saadaasha cimilada saxda ah beerahaaga
features.voiceDescription: Ku hadal si dabiici ah luqaddaada

onboarding.locationDescription: La wadaag goobtaada si aad u hesho saadaasha cimilada saxda ah iyo talo beerasho oo degaankaaga gaar ah.
onboarding.locationError: Lama helin goobta. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
onboarding.languageSubtitle: Dooro luqadda aad doorbiddayso ee kaaliyaha

media.photoLibraryPermission: Waxaa loo baahan yahay helitaanka maktabadda sawirrada si aad sawirro u doorato. Ka hawlgeli Goobaha.

media.cameraFailed: Lama heli karin kamaradda. Fadlan mar kale isku day.

settings.title: Goobaha
settings.chatHistorySubtitle: Eeg oo sii wad sheekooyinkii hore
settings.aiServicesSubtitle: Eeg adeegyada AI ee deegaankaaga ka shaqaynaya
settings.locationUpdated: Goobta si guul ah ayaa loo cusboonaysiiyay!
settings.locationUpdateFailed: Lama cusboonaysiin karin goobta. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
settings.tapToUpdateLocation: Taabo si aad u cusboonaysiiso goobta
settings.resetConfirmMessage: Tani waxay dib u billaabi doontaa habka dejinta bilowga. Ma sii wadaysaa?

mcp.title: Adeegyada AI
mcp.footer: Helitaanka adeeggu wuxuu ku xiran yahay goobtaada
mcp.couldNotLoadDetails: Faahfaahinta adeegga lama soo shubin karin
mcp.servicesAvailable: {active} ka mid ah {total} adeeg ayaa laga helayaa goobtaada

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.tagline: Aqoonsiga iyo baadhista cudurrada dhirta ee AI ku shaqeeya
agrivision.description: Falanqee sawirrada dhirta si aad u aqoonsato cudurrada, cayayaanka, iyo nafaqo-darrooyinka. Hel baadhitaan degdeg ah oo wata talooyin daaweyn iyo ka hortag.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Ciid
isdaSoil.tagline: Tilmaamaha ciidda iyo baadhista nafaqooyinka ee Afrika
isdaSoil.description: Hel macluumaad faahfaahsan oo ciidda ah oo ay ku jiraan pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, iyo nafaqooyinka kale. Wuxuu daboolayaa dhammaan Afrika oo leh cabbir 30-mitir ah.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Xaaladaha hadda jira iyo saadaasha hawada ee adduunka oo dhan
accuweather.description: Hel macluumaadka cimilada ee waqtiga dhabta ah oo ay ku jiraan heerkulka, qoyaanka, xawaaraha dabaysha, iyo roobka. Saadaashu waxay diyaar tahay ilaa 15 maalmood.

gapWeather.name: GAP Hawada
gapWeather.description: Saadaasha cimilada gaarka ah ee beeraha Kenya. Waxaa ku jira uumibaxa biyaha, shucaaca qoraxda, iyo saadaasha roobka oo loogu talagalay go'aamada beeraha.

edacap.name: EDACaP Cimilada
edacap.description: Aragti cimilada xilliyeed oo ay ku jiraan saadaasha heerkulka iyo roobka. Waxay ka caawisaa beeralayda inay qorsheeyaan jadwalaha beero-gooynta.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.tagline: Xogta cimilada ee goobaha caalamiga ah
weatherapi.description: Adeeg xog cimilada oo dhammaystiran oo bixiya xaaladaha hadda jira iyo saadaasha goobaha adduunka oo dhan.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Madal horumarsan oo xog-ogaalnimada cimilada ah oo leh saadaalo tayo sare leh iyo awoodo saadaalin degdeg ah.

feedFormulation.name: Diyaarinta Quudka
feedFormulation.tagline: Xisaabinta quudka ugu habboon ee lo'da caanaha
feedFormulation.description: Xisaabi isku-darka quudka ugu kharash-yar ee lo'daada caanaha. Waxay tixgelinaysaa yoolalka wax-soo-saarka caanaha, miisaanka jirka, iyo quudka deegaanka ee diyaar ah.

nextgen.name: Bacriminta Cusub
nextgen.tagline: Talooyinka bacriminta gaarka ah ee goobta ee Ethiopia
nextgen.description: Hel talooyin bacrimin oo sax ah oo ku salaysan goobtaada saxda ah. Waxaa ku jira talooyin organic ah (digada, vermicompost) iyo kuwa aan organic ahayn (Urea, NPS).

decisionTree.name: Go'aanka Dalagga
decisionTree.description: Hel talooyin maareynta dalagga oo ku salaysan heerka koritaanka iyo xaaladaha cimilada ee hadda jira. Waxay kaa caawisaa inaad go'aanno waqtigooda ah ka gaarto xakamaynta cayayaanka, waraabka, iyo goosashada.

gapAgriculture.name: GAP Beeraha
gapAgriculture.description: Adeegyada talada beeraha ee guud ee maareynta dalagga iyo xoolaha.

system.errorFallback: Cilad lama filaan ah baa dhacday

errors.syncFailed: Server-ka lama gaadhin. Adeegyada qaar way xaddidan yihiin.
errors.weatherUnavailable: Adeegga cimilada si kumeelgaadh ah uma shaqeeyo. Mar dambe isku day.
errors.diagnosisTimeout: Baadhitaanka geedaha wuxuu qaadanayaa wakhti dheer. Fadlan mar labaad isku day.
errors.uploadFailed: Sawirka lama soo gelin karin. Hubi isku xidhkaaga oo mar labaad isku day.
errors.transcriptionFailed: Qoraalka codka way guuldarraysatay. Mar labaad hadal.
errors.serverError: Cilad server ah. Fadlan mar dambe isku day.
errors.requestTimeout: Codsigu wuu dhacay. Hubi isku xidhkaaga.
errors.locationLookupFailed: Lama go'aamin karin meesha aad joogto.

a11y.retryLoadingIntegrations: Dib u soo deji isku xirka
